itemDisplayName: Deploy a Bing News Search API Cognitive Pipeline
description: This ARM template demonstrates the deployment of a Bing News Search API Cognitive Pipeline with the resources to evaluate and augment the news article and put the augmented data into an SQL database for a PowerBI report to access
summary: This ARM template demonstrates the deployment of a Bing News Search API Cognitive Pipeline with sentiment anlysis and entity extraction from the news article content.  Keyword sentiment analysis of the news.
